dublin_core.dcvalue: Rapid urbanization in China has led to a proliferation of electronic entertainment media among youth Prolonged screen time ST includes watching television and playing on computers video game consoles or mobile phones is linked to poor health profiles The aim of this study was to report recreational ST behaviors and ST correlates among Chinese adolescents living in two regions with different degrees of urbanization
Journal of epidemiology / Japan Epidemiological Association
Recreational screen-time among Chinese adolescents: a cross-sectional study.
